question: 2024 में Bharat Ratna का सम्मान किसे-किसे (posthumously) दिया गया? / Who were posthumously awarded the Bharat Ratna in 2024?
2019 में Bharat Ratna पुरस्कार किस-किसे दिया गया था? / Who were awarded the Bharat Ratna in 2019?
Sachin Tendulkar को Bharat Ratna किस वर्ष मिला और वह किस क्षेत्र से जुड़ते हैं? / In which year did Sachin Tendulkar receive the Bharat Ratna, and in which field is he associated?
C. N. R. Rao ने Bharat Ratna किस क्षेत्र में योगदान के लिए प्राप्त की? / For contributions in which field was C. N. R. Rao awarded the Bharat Ratna?
Jayaprakash Narayan को Bharat Ratna किस वर्ष (posthumously) प्रदान की गई थी? / In which year was Jayaprakash Narayan posthumously awarded the Bharat Ratna?
2024 में Dadasaheb Phalke Award किसे दिया गया? / Who won the Dadasaheb Phalke Award in 2024?
Padma Vibhushan 2024 के विजेताओं में कौन शामिल हैं? / Who were among the Padma Vibhushan awardees in 2024?
Padma Bhushan 2024 में किसे विज्ञान के क्षेत्र में सम्मानित किया गया? / Who received the Padma Bhushan 2024 for Science?
Padma Shri 2024 के अंतर्गत 'Arts' के क्षेत्र में किसे सम्मान मिला? / Who was awarded Padma Shri 2024 in the field of Arts?
2024 Gandhi Peace Prize किसे दिया गया? / Who received the Gandhi Peace Prize in 2024?
2024 में Arjuna Award किसे Cricket में मिला? / Who won the Arjuna Award 2024 for Cricket?
Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna 2024 का विजेता कौन है? / Who won the Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna Award in 2024?
Ekalabya Puraskar 2024 का विजेता कौन बना? / Who won the Ekalabya Award in 2024?
Sahitya Akademi Award 2024 (Hindi भाषा) के विजेता कौन हैं? / Who is the winner of Sahitya Akademi Award 2024 for Hindi?
Jnanpith Award 2023 विजेता कौन रहे (घोषणा 2024 में)? / Who won the Jnanpith Award 2023 (announced in 2024)?
2024 में Arjuna Award पाने वाली महिला क्रिकेटर कौन हैं? / Which female cricketer received the Arjuna Award in 2024?
2024 Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna पुरस्कार किसे मिला? / Who won the Major Dhyan Chand Khel Ratna Award in 2024?
Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna Award अब किस नाम से जाना जाता है? / What is the new name of the Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna Award?
2024 Sahitya Akademi Award (हिंदी) किसे मिला? / Who won the 2024 Sahitya Akademi Award in Hindi?
Jnanpith Award 2023 (घोषणा 2024) किस भाषा के लेखक को मिला? / Which language's author won the Jnanpith Award 2023 (announced in 2024)?
2024 में Sahitya Akademi Yuva Puraskar (हिंदी) किसे मिला? / Who won the 2024 Sahitya Akademi Yuva Puraskar for Hindi?
Ekalabya Award 2024 किस महिला हॉकी खिलाड़ी को दिया गया? / Which female hockey player won the Ekalabya Award 2024?
Dronacharya Award 2024 के अंतर्गत Athletics कोच का नाम क्या है? / Who received the Dronacharya Award 2024 for Athletics?
Saraswati Samman 2024 किसे मिला? / Who won the Saraswati Samman in 2024?
Vyas Samman 2024 के विजेता कौन हैं? / Who won the Vyas Samman 2024?
2024 में Padma Shri से विज्ञान के क्षेत्र में किस वयⁿिज्ञानी को सम्मानित किया गया? / Which scientist was awarded the Padma Shri in the field of Science in 2024?
2024 में पर्यावरण विज्ञान क्षेत्र में Padma Shri विजेता कौन है? / Who received the Padma Shri in Environmental Science in 2024?
West Bengal के पर्यावरण कार्यकर्ता Dukhu Majhi को Padma Shri कब और किसके लिए मिला? / When and for what did environmental activist Dukhu Majhi receive the Padma Shri?
State‑level Prakruti Mitra Award 2024‑25 विश्वविद्यालय क्षेत्र में किस यूनिवर्सिटी को मिला? / Which university won the Prakruti Mitra Award 2024‑25 in the green campus initiative category?

2025 में EXCEED Environment CSR & HR Awards में 'Champion – Environment Sustainability' अवार्ड किस संगठन को मिला? / Which organization won the 'Champion – Environment Sustainability' award at the 2025 EXCEED Environment CSR & HR Awards?
Angul जिला के पर्यावरण अभियानकर्ता Subrat Pradhan को कौन-कौन से पुरस्कार मिले हैं? / Which awards has environmental campaigner Subrat Pradhan from Angul received?

options.D: A और B दोनों (A & B both)

question: Padma Shri 2025 में सामाजिक कार्य (जैसे जंगल संरक्षण, जल संरक्षण) के लिए किसे सम्मानित किया गया? / Who received the Padma Shri in 2025 for social work in afforestation and water conservation?

Assam Governor Award for Excellence 2025 में Science, Engineering, Medicine & Environment कैटेगरी में किसे सम्मानित किया गया? / In the Assam Governor Award for Excellence 2025, who was honoured in the Science, Engineering, Medicine & Environment category?

Assam Governor Award for Excellence 2025 में Literature & Education के लिए posthumous सम्मान किसे मिला? / Who received the posthumous award in Literature & Education at the Assam Governor Award for Excellence 2025?
Green School Awards 2025 में कौन सा राज्य  Best State Award और  Best District Award जीता? / Which state and district won the Best State and Best District Awards at the Green School Awards 2025?
Times of India Earth Care Awards 2025 में कौन सा खास कार्यक्रम युवाओं के लिए तैयार किया गया था? / What special programme was included for youth in the Times of India Earth Care Awards 2025?
SkOCH Silver Award 2024 किस विभाग को मिला और किस क्षेत्र में? / Which department received the SkOCH Silver Award 2024 and for what?

options.A: Punjab Horticulture Department – Women Empowerment through Sericulture

question: NTPC Kaniha (Odisha) को कौन‑सा पर्यावरण पुरस्कार 2024 में मिला? / Which environmental award did NTPC Kaniha (Odisha) receive in 2024?

options.B: Kalinga Environment Excellence National Award – Five Star

question: Uttar Pradesh Gaurav Samman 2023‑24 में निम्नलिखित में से किसे सम्मानित किया गया था? / Who received the Uttar Pradesh Gaurav Samman in 2023‑24?

options.D: P. V. Sindhu & D. Nageshwara Reddy

question: Champions of Change Karnataka 2023 में निम्नलिखित में से किसे सम्मानित किया गया था? / Who was honoured in the Champions of Change Karnataka 2023?

options.A: Padma Vibhushan C. N. R. Rao

question: Uttarakhand Gaurav Samman 2024 के अंतर्गत इस पुरस्कार को किस क्षेत्र में प्रथम बार प्राप्त किया गया था? / In the Uttarakhand Gaurav Samman 2024, which field was among the recognitions for the first time?

Van Mahotsav 2025 (Odisha) में वन संरक्षण के लिए किस समूह को राज्य‑स्तरीय पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया? / During Van Mahotsav 2025 in Odisha, which group was honoured with a state-level award for forest conservation?

Swachh Survekshan 2024‑25 में 'Super Swachh League' (10 लाख+ जनसंख्या) का शीर्ष स्थान किस ने हासिल किया? / Which city topped the Super Swachh League (population over 1 million) in Swachh Survekshan 2024‑25?

Swachh Survekshan 2024‑25 में Ujjain Municipal Corporation ने किस जनसंख्या वर्ग में शीर्ष स्थान जीता? / In which population category did Ujjain Municipal Corporation secure the top rank in Swachh Survekshan 2024‑25?

Swachh Survekshan 2024‑25 में Karnal Municipal Corporation ने किस श्रेणी में राष्ट्रीय  President Award प्राप्त किया? / In which category did Karnal Municipal Corporation receive the President’s Award in Swachh Survekshan 2024‑25?
National Water Awards 2024 में 'Best Urban Local Body' का पुरस्कार किस नगर निगम को मिला? / Which municipal corporation won the ‘Best Urban Local Body’ award in the National Water Awards 2024?
SKOCH Award 2025 में शहर‑स्तरीय waste management के लिए किस नगर निगम को Silver Award मिला? / Which municipal corporation received the SKOCH Silver Award 2025 for waste management?
Chandrapur Municipal Corporation को SKOCH Silver Award किस पहल के लिए मिला? / For which initiative did Chandrapur Municipal Corporation receive the SKOCH Silver Award?

IEEE International Smart Cities Award 2024 में ‘Emerging Economy – Legacy Cities’ श्रेणी में कौन सी नगर निगम विजेता रही? / Which municipal corporation won the IEEE International Smart Cities Award 2024 in the ‘Emerging Economy – Legacy Cities’ category?

National e‑Governance Awards 2025 में ग्राम‑पंचायती स्तर की नवीन e‑Governance पहल के लिए Gold Award किसने जीता? / Which gram panchayat won the Gold Award in 2025 National e‑Governance Awards under the grassroots category?
Pimpri‑Chinchwad Municipal Corporation (PCMC) को e‑Governance के लिए कौन‑सा पुरस्कार मिला? / Which award did PCMC receive for e‑Governance achievements?

options.C: Silver Award in district‑level e‑governance scheme
